item.title: Bitwise and of Numbers Range
item.description: Given a range [m, n] where 0 <= m <= n <= 2147483647, return the bitwise AND of all numbers in this range, inclusive. Example 1 Input: [5,7] Output: 4 Example 2 Input: [0,1] Output: 0 Solution class Solution: def rangeBitwiseAnd(self, m: int, n: int) -> int: shift = 0 while m < n: m = m >> 1 n = n >> 1 shift += 1 m = m << shift return m
